suites.title: ON NET Cash Transfer API Tests

tests.title: should process on net cash transfer and return success response
tests.fullTitle: ON NET Cash Transfer API Tests Successful ON Cash Transfer should process on net cash transfer and return success response

err.message:
CypressError: `cy.request()` failed trying to load:

http://127.0.0.1:8881/Prod_200_AppManagerWildFly21/gateway/transaction

We attempted to make an http request to this URL but the request failed without a response.

We received this error at the network level:

  > Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:8881

-----------------------------------------------------------

The request we sent was:

Method: POST
URL: http://127.0.0.1:8881/Prod_200_AppManagerWildFly21/gateway/transaction

-----------------------------------------------------------

Common situations why this would fail:
  - you don't have internet access
  - you forgot to run / boot your web server
  - your web server isn't accessible
  - you have weird network configuration settings on your computer

https://on.cypress.io/request
